Title: Long Live the Queen
Writer: Michael Dante DiMartino (created by), Tim Hedrick, Bryan Konietzko (created by)
Actors: Janet Varney, David Faustino, Seychelle Gabriel, P.J. Byrne
Plot: While en route to Ba Sing Se, Korra and Asami manage to escape from their cell, but their attempt to take control of the vessel results in the vessel losing altitude and hitting the sand. ...
